reviews.author: James J.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Emily T.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Susan S.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Elizabeth Antique Appraisal Service's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Robert C.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

business.pricing: Appraisal fees vary by collection size and complexity. Contact Heritage Valuations Ottawa in Ottawa, ON for a tailored quote.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Ottawa provides professional antique appraisal services in the Ottawa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving Ottawa, ON clients who need antique valuations in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles, Estate Jewelry.

reviews.author: Sarah T.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.
